Constructor Detail

Stalfos

public Stalfos(GameObjects objects,
               int xPos,
               int yPos)
Creates an instance of the enemy at the specified position.

Parameters:
objects - A reference to all the other objects in the game.
xPos - The X position to create the enemy at.
yPos - The Y position to create the enemy at.
Method Detail

move

public void move()
Determines whether or not to change its direction and then moves in the direction which it facing.

checkCollisions

public boolean checkCollisions()
Checks whether or not the player has collided with the enemy.

Returns:
True if the player has run into the enemy; otherwise, false.

chooseNewDirection

public void chooseNewDirection()
Determine which direction the enemy should start facing based on its current position.

Calculates the horizontal position on the spritesheet of the current sprite.

Returns:
The horizontal position of the current sprite on the spritesheet.

getSpriteCoordinateY

public int getSpriteCoordinateY()
Calculates the vertical position on the spritesheet of the current sprite.

Returns:
The vertical position of the current sprite on the spritesheet.
